channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This global health leader praises Trump's aid plan -- and gears up to beat malaria
item.description: Bill Steiger, who served in the George H.W. Bush and first Trump administrations, reflects on the past year's changes in the U.S. role — and his new j...

item.title: With an ACA fix uncertain in the Senate, Republicans replay old health care fights
item.description: Things are looking bleak for a fix in Congress for ACA premiums that doubled, on average, this month. And Republicans are making arguments against the...

item.title: After being hit by a car, she was saved by a lavender bunny
item.description: Eight years ago, Joann Moschella was injured after her bicycle was hit by a car. That's when her unsung hero appeared, dressed in a furry lavender bun...

item.title: Hemp and marijuana are the same species. So why all the different laws?
item.description: Farmers in the U.S. have grown cannabis since the 1600s — but policymakers are still figuring out how to regulate two famous types of Cannabis sativa ...

item.title: The House races to end shutdown. And, Trump wants to close Kennedy Center for 2 years
item.description: Lawmakers are racing to end a partial government shutdown after Congress missed its funding deadline on Friday. And, Trump wants to close the Kennedy ...

item.title: 'Pay and smile' - Rome visitors face Trevi Fountain charge
item.description: Italy's capital city has introduced a €2 fee to access the viewing area of its iconic fountain, which had previously been free to visit.

item.title: Major political upset in Texas after Democrats win special elections
item.description: Two Democrats won key races in Texas, narrowing the Republican majority in Congress. CBS News' Fin Gomez has more.

item.title: Beijing criticises Dalai Lama Grammy win as 'manipulation'
item.description: The Buddhist spiritual leader is recognised in the audiobook category for his meditations.

item.title: Funding fight turns to the House as lawmakers look to avoid lengthy shutdown
item.description: The House is returning to Washington on Monday, where GOP leaders are aiming to move swiftly to approve the funding package.

item.title: 'Superhuman' teen swims hours to save family stranded off Australian coast
item.description: The 13-year-old swam 4km in rough water after his mother and siblings were swept out to sea off the coast of Western Australia.

item.title: Savannah Guthrie's mother missing in Arizona
item.description: Authorities in the Tucson, Arizona, area are searching for the mother of "Today" show host Savannah Guthrie, 84-year-old Nancy Guthrie, who has been r...

item.title: Mother of "Today" show host Savannah Guthrie reported missing
item.description: The mother of "Today" show host Savannah Guthrie has been reported missing in Arizona. Nancy Guthrie was last seen at her home just north of Tucson. J...

item.title: Watch: Punxsutawney Phil emerges for Groundhog Day
item.description: Legend has it that if Punxsutawney Phil sees its shadow there will be six more weeks of winter, if not, spring is around the corner.

item.title: Ukraine hails 'real results' after Musk restricts Russian Starlink use
item.description: Starlink-enabled drones have been linked to a number of recent deadly attacks by Russia on Ukraine.

item.title: House of Representatives takes on partial government shutdown
item.description: Members of the House of Representatives are considering a funding package passed by the Senate to fund the government after a partial shutdown began o...

item.title: Mayor of Portland, Oregon, demands ICE leave the city after federal agents gas protesters
5-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and father return to Minnesota from ICE facility in Texas
item.description: Five-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and his father have returned to Minnesota after being released by U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement.

item.title: Man sentenced to 4 years in prison for throwing Molotov cocktail during LA immigration protest
